CustomField.description: Capture the text month value of the close date for use in reporting
CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH( CloseDate ),1, '1 - January', 2, '2 - February', 3, '3 - March', 4, '4 - April', 5, '5 - May', 6, '6 - June', 7, '7 - July', 8, '8 - August', 9, '9 - September', 10, '10 - October', 11, '11 - November', 12, '12 - December','' )
CustomField.label: Close Month
